dmca.title: Complaint of Usenet posting in Google Groups
dmca.body:
Dear Sir:	`

Please remove my copyrighted text from: http://groups.google.com/group/okcfreespeak/browse_thread/thread/f932e6bdf41485b1/7746fb0b7839c7fa?hl=en#7746fb0b7839c7fa

It begins with "Rich,
It was brought to my attention that I ...

And ends with " ... You can see the results
for yourself: chris throwing mud; you trying to goad me.

RC

I composed this text. Unlicensed verbatim publication of the entire work took place on the above cited url.

I've requested the text be removed three times and each time the request has been refused. These requests were directed to [private]. His e-mail address is [private]@yahoo.com.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I affirm, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed

Sincerely,
 
[private]
